name: Yet Another Fighting Game Y.A.F.G.
description:
Y.A.F.G.

================================================

Yet Another Fighting Game

================================================

Fighting game where you help to game developer by playing this game.

A or LEFT ARROW - move left

S or DOWN ARROW - crouch

D or  RIGHT ARROW - move right

SPACE or UP ARROW - jump

I - punch

J - uppercut

K - kick

L - shoot

================================================

Main Idea - Programming - Game Design - Art - @BULBULSUP

4th level background art behind main heroes 

was generated by Dall-e mini AI and corrected by @BULBULSUP

Music - @VADIMASPIN_PRO and free music from YouTube

================================================

THANKS FOR PLAYING  !
